name: Dice Arena (Scienitive)
description:
Controls:

  • WS to move
  • AD to change direction
  • Mouse to click

Rules:

  • Goal of the game is having more tiles than your opponent by the end of the game.
  • Every 6 rounds Grand Roll event happens and gives each player a specialty. That specialty stays until the next Grand Roll.
  • After dying, player misses next 3 rounds and then respawns on a random tile of it's own.

Known Issues:

  • If the game is not steady 60FPS and very slow, the game may not run properly. Please use a different browser or download the game.

Dice Arena is a chess-like 1v1 strategy game. You can play Dice Arena with your friend locally or against the AI.

Music: Rachmaninoff - Prelude in G Minor (Op. 23 No. 5)

This game is made by Altuğ Alpcan Yaşar in 2 days for GMTK22 Jam.
